projects.title: [2025 Season menu] Sarr
projects.english description: Seasonal menu poster design for Sarr, exploring typography and visual identity through graphic design.
projects.korean description: Seasonal menu poster design for Sarr, exploring typography and visual identity through graphic design.

projects.title: [2025 Season menu] Sarr
projects.english description: Seasonal menu poster design for Sarr, exploring typography and visual identity through graphic design.
projects.korean descrtiption: Seasonal menu poster design for Sarr, exploring typography and visual identity through graphic design.

projects.title: UFO
projects.english description: This project is an interactive web artwork that visualizes UFO sighting data from 10 U.S. states using 3D sculptures inspired by crop circles and alien antennas. Built with Three.js, each antenna’s height and complexity reflect the number of sightings. Users can explore and compare states through intuitive mouse, zoom, and pan controls, while an interactive map reveals overall patterns and distributions across regions.
projects.korean description: 이 프로젝트는 크롭 서클과 외계인 안테나에서 영감을 받은 3D 조형물을 활용해 10개 미국 주의 UFO 목격 데이터를 시각화한 인터랙티브 웹 아트워크입니다. Three.js로 구현된 각 안테나는 목격 횟수에 따라 높이와 복잡도가 달라집니다. 사용자는 직관적인 마우스, 줌, 팬 컨트롤로 주별 데이터를 탐색하고 비교할 수 있으며, 인터랙티브 지도를 통해 지역별 패턴과 분포를 한눈에 확인할 수 있습니다.

Built with Three.js, each antenna’s height and complexity reflect the number of sightings. projects.title: Universe
projects.english description: “By quoting the phrase “Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known,” this work expresses the vastness of the universe and the potential of the unknown. Based on this concept, particles arranged along the form of text respond to mouse movement by scattering and returning to their original positions, creating a cosmic visual effect. Particle attributes such as size, color, and interaction behavior can be adjusted in real time through GUI sliders, allowing users to customize dynamic visual variations while maintaining overall design consistency.
projects.korean description: “Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known”이라는 문구를 통해 우주의 광활함과 미지의 가능성을 표현하고자 했습니다. 이를 바탕으로 텍스트 형태를 따라 배치된 파티클은 마우스 움직임에 반응해 흩어졌다가 다시 돌아오며 우주적인 시각 효과를 만들어냅니다. 파티클의 크기, 색상, 상호작용 속성은 GUI 슬라이더로 실시간 조절할 수 있어, 일관된 디자인 속에서 다양한 시각적 변화를 커스터마이징할 수 있습니다.

projects.title: Holiday Nagging Visualization
projects.description: A cultural art piece using audio recordings to explore Korean family dynamics during holidays through interactive visualization. This project combines data visualization with personal narrative to create a resonant exploration of cultural expectations.

projects.title: UFO Data Sculpture
projects.description: A comprehensive data visualization featuring metallic sculptures representing UFO sightings across different US states. This project translates data into physical form, exploring the relationship between information and material presence.

projects.title: Emotion Tea Blending
projects.description: An interactive system exploring the relationship between emotions and tea blending through web-based interface design. Users select emotions to generate custom tea blend recommendations.

projects.title: Generative Typography
projects.description: A generative typography system using particle systems and p5.js to create dynamic text visualizations. This project explores the boundary between readable text and abstract visual form.

projects.title: AR Time Experience
projects.description: A speculative design project exploring augmented reality as a medium for experiencing and purchasing time. This work questions the commodification of temporal experience.

projects.title: Cyber Garden
projects.description: An interactive installation exploring the intersection of digital technology and natural environments through immersive media. The piece creates a hybrid space between organic and digital realms.

projects.title: Sound Waves
projects.description: An audio visualization project using WebGL to create dynamic visual representations of sound waves. Real-time audio input generates responsive visual patterns.

projects.title: Memory Archive
projects.description: A database-driven web interface for archiving and exploring personal and collective memories. This project examines how digital systems shape the way we preserve and access memory.

projects.title: Kinetic Poetry
projects.description: A motion design project exploring the intersection of poetry and kinetic typography. Text becomes animated, adding temporal dimension to poetic meaning.

projects.title: Climate Futures
projects.description: A speculative design project imagining future scenarios related to climate change through editorial design. The work creates tangible artifacts from imagined futures.

projects.title: Neural Networks
projects.description: A research project visualizing neural network architectures and machine learning processes. Complex computational processes are translated into comprehensible visual forms.

projects.title: Digital Botanica
projects.description: A 3D modeling and animation project exploring digital representations of botanical forms using Blender. Organic forms are reimagined through digital tools.

projects.title: Lunar Calendar
projects.description: An editorial design project creating a lunar calendar with careful attention to typography and print production. The calendar connects celestial cycles with daily life.

projects.title: Urban Flows
projects.description: A data visualization project mapping urban movement patterns and city flows through information design. The work reveals hidden patterns in urban mobility.
